tr.td: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3doses
Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
draft
WHO
computable

div.p: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

tr.td:
Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Because serious Hib disease occurs most commonly in children aged 4–18 months, immunization should start from 6 weeks of age, or as early as possible thereafter. The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks if 3 primary doses are given. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for Hib vaccination: Client is due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first Hib dose as no Hib doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for Hib vaccination: Client is due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second Hib dose as client's age was less than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Hib immunization schedule is complete: Hib immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")
When a first dose is given to a child aged over 12 months, only one dose is recommended
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Hib immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Hib immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered. One Hib primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks if 3 primary doses are given. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for Hib vaccination: Client is due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range and latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Hib immunization schedule is complete: Hib immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")
–
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Hib immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Hib immunization schedule is complete. Three Hib primary series doses were administered. Check for any vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
–
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with Hib dose as client is more than 5 years old and Hib vaccination is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
